job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: ltstronggtwe are creating a technology centric rampampd incubator in the biotech space and are looking for a fully remote senior data scientistltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthis jobot job is hosted by matt gennariltbrgtltbrgtare you a fit easy apply now by clicking the apply button and sending us your resumeltbrgtltbrgtsalary per yearltbrgtltbrgtltstronggta bit about usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe are a person biotechnology startup that is focused on creating an rampampd incubator that creates innovative solutions to sustainably feed clothe and keep health the growing world population we integrate and create cutting edge and novel advances in synthetic biology data sciences and analytical systems and are looking for a senior data scientist who wants to be part of a sustainable and ethical company whereltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligt extremely competitive base up to k depending on experienceltligtltligt bonus every yearltligtltligt profitsharingltligtltligt full healthcare benefitsltligtltligt fully remoteltligtltligt the chance to get in on the ground floor with a growing startupltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtjob detailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe are looking for someone to drive the development and implementation of data analysis systems at the intersection of ml and biology you will be a part of a team engaged in cuttingedge genetic engineering with a custom computational platform you will also develop ml algorithms and integrate knowledge of biological models and databases with ml algorithms to provide recommendations for biological engineeringltbrgtltbrgtif you have a strong background in python machine learning and statistics please reach outltbrgtltbrgtinterested in hearing more easy apply now by clicking the apply buttonltbrgtltbrgt
